committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To provide for the off-budget treatment of the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund under the Social Security Act made effective with Fiscal Year 1990.

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Amendments of 1983 and the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to make the off-budget treatment of the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund effective FY 1990, rather than FY 1992.

titles.title: To provide for the off-budget treatment of the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund under the Social Security Act made effective with Fiscal Year 1990.
